Name: 众生
About the game: The Lives is a realistic life simulation game. You will play as somebody living in contemporary China, with randomly generated family background, attributes and personality. You will play through this life from three years old to its end, during which you are free to make choices for your own, including what to learn, when to play, who to socialize, or even when to build a new family. All those choices will lead this life into different paths, as your character’s data is changed by every decision you make.
